thread.title: Arsene Wenger denies receiving Paris Saint-Germain contract offer
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger denies receiving Paris Saint-Germain contract offer

author: Chris Davie
title: Arsene Wenger denies receiving Paris Saint-Germain contract offer
text:
Arsene Wenger has denied receiving a contract from PSG. (Anadolu Agency/Getty Images) Arsene Wenger has ‘formally denied’ reports claiming that he has been offered a contract by Paris Saint-Germain.
‘It is not true,’ Wenger told beIN Sports .
‘That it was what you call fake news. I formally deny it.’
More to follow…
MORE: Arsenal rival Juventus for Leon Goretzka transfer from Schalke 
MORE: Arsenal’s Mesut Ozil ruled out of Germany vs England by Joachim Low
